15:00 <CIA-74> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r2e4214a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2e4214acc14264dbcd90264d814dcb44bd78703f / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/ExtensionManagerMacros.xml : [misc] Fix invalid field name ('default' is a reserved keyword). - http://git.io/3bKeqg  
15:01 <Shaddox> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:04 <lpereira> has quit  
15:18 <jvipa5g> has joined #xwiki  
15:21 <jvipa5g> moinmoin wiki currently use as portable, shared with dropbox. I have considered using XWiki, as it gives me something else. For everyday use, on a personal level and working, would you recommend I go from moinmoin to XWiki? Worth the change?  
15:28 <AndreasJonsson> jvipa5g: I have myself moved from moinmoin to XWiki, and thought it was worth it.  
15:28 <AndreasJonsson> I also have a tool for packaging the contents of a moinmoin-wiki as a xar-file for import to XWiki.  
15:29 <AndreasJonsson> I'm not sure if it works any longer, though.  
15:38 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson: But are you happy with the change?  
15:42 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson: When backing up or upgrading is simple?  
15:43 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson: And where I can get the import tool?  
15:49 <AndreasJonsson> Yes, I'm happy with the change.  
15:50 <AndreasJonsson> I converted my wiki three years ago and the converter tool has been unmaintained since.  But I can put it on github if you are prepared to work with it.  
15:51 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson:I found in version 3.x XWiki, that when a long text pasted into a new wiki page, it gave errors. Do not know if will continue failing.  
15:52 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson: if I download shows as I can prove it on github to convert my wiki.  
15:56 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
16:04 <AndreasJonsson> jvipa5g: Which text were you pasting?  Did you paste it in WYSIWYG mode?  Have you reported the problem at jira.xwiki.org?  
16:27 <mflorea> has quit  
16:27 <mflorea1> has joined #xwiki

17:04 <polx> has quit  
17:04 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:15 <jvipa5g> AndreasJonsson: was in WYSIWYG mode, but a while. if producri I will report back. What is the limit of text in a wiki page with XWiki?  
17:27 <AndreasJonsson> The page contents is stored as 'longtext' in MySQL.  I guess the limit is decided by how you configure 'max\_allowed\_packet' in MySQL.
